# addAnimations(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an animation block for modifying a view animation while it’s running.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func addAnimations(_ animations: @escaping () -> Void)
```

## Parameters

- **animations**: A block that sets animatable view properties.

## Adding animations

- **addCompletion(_:)**: Adds an animation completion block to run when a view animation has ended.
